candidate_description: Motivated and curious master’s student with hands-on experience in robotics, AI, and intelligent systems — passionate about solving real-world problems at the intersection of software, hardware, and innovation, enriched by international exposure and cross-cultural collaboration.

education.degree: ACAP (Academic Course Access Program) Exchange Student (M.Sc)

experience.description: Research, Design and Development of a 3-Axis Pan-Tilt Robot Arm for Linux Driver sensor test automation.
key_achievements: Forschung, Entwurf und Entwicklung eines dreiachsigen Schwenk-Neige-Roboterarms zur Automatisierung von Sensortests unter Verwendung von Linux-Treibern, Raspberry Pi mit Python und C++.

experience.description: Developed Microsoft Azure pipeline for Microphone Audio Dataloop for Siren Detection in Automated Driving.
key_achievements: Entwicklung einer Microsoft Azure-Pipeline für Audiodatenschleifen zur Erkennung von Sirenen beim automatisierten Fahren.

experience.description: Developing ph-DMD Julia-based packages for port-Hamiltonian systems and model order reduction of pH systems.

projects.name: Hack NOW! 2024
projects.description: We developed a web API that optimizes carpooling by matching nearby fans for shared rides to reduce CO2 emissions.
projects.achievements: 3rd Place in the challenge, developed by Silbury Deutschland GmbH and NTT Data Business Solutions

achievements.title: Baden-Württemberg-Stipendium 2024
achievements.description: Sponsored by Baden-Württemberg-Stiftung, for the purpose of Abroad Study as an Exchange Student for one semester at Tokyo Institute of Technology, Japan in collaboration with University of Stuttgart, Germany.

achievements.title: Deutschlandstipendium 2023-25
achievements.description: One among 157 Scholarship grants awarded by the University of Stuttgart.

achievements.title: Huawei Future Star 2020
achievements.description: Best Innovative Performer with more than 15K lines of code in 6 months and good quality development & delivery with Minimal Defects.

publications.title: A Novel Curve Scanning Based Maximum Power Point Tracking Algorithm Under Partial Shading Conditions
publications.journal_conference: 2020 IEEE First International Conference on Smart Technologies for Power, Energy and Control (STPEC)
publications.description: A Novel Curve Scanning Based Maximum Power Point Tracking Algorithm Under Partial Shading Conditions
